name: Connect With Kids
description: CWK is an instructional media company that produces documentary programs for television and evidenced-based, multimedia programs for schools with a focus on student behavior, parent engagement and social and emotional issues. Using the power of storytelling and peer-to-peer learning, Connect with Kids programs spark emotional connection and inspire positive behavior and cultural change. ** Sign Up and create your own user name and password, using the organization code. If you need that code, Please click the link on the Welcome page.
